Create module¶

class useCases.room.Create.Create¶

Bases: object

Class to create room in server

static response(user, server, args) → entities.User.User¶

Performs the creation of a room in the Server :param server: IP where the server will be allocated :param args: args to create the room :returns: user obj with the changes
